title: SD Hullera Vasco-Leonesa
text:
Sociedad Deportiva Hullera Vasco-Leonesa was a <a href="List%20of%20football%20clubs%20in%20Spain">football</a> team based in <a href="Ci%C3%B1era">Ciñera</a>, town belonging to <a href="La%20Pola%20de%20Gord%C3%B3n">La Pola de Gordón</a> municipality in the autonomous community of <a href="Castile%20and%20Le%C3%B3n">Castile and León</a>. Founded in 1950, it last played in the <a href="Divisiones%20Regionales%20de%20F%C3%BAtbol%20in%20Castile%20and%20Le%C3%B3n">Primera Provincial de León</a>. Its stadium was "Polideportivo Santa Bárbara", with a capacity of 2,600 seats.
The club ceased its activity in 2013.
